# UpDown vX.Y.Z

## Installation (macOS)

1. Download **UpDown_X.Y.Z_aarch64.dmg** from the assets below.
2. Open the DMG and drag UpDown to your Applications folder.
3. **First launch:** If macOS says the app is from an unidentified developer, **right-click UpDown â†’ Open**, then click **Open** in the dialog. You only need to do this once.
